# Brocas Area
- If this area is damaged, one may have difficulty moving the tongue or facial muscles to produce the sounds of speech. The person can still read and understand spoken [language](language.qmd) but has difficulty in speaking and writing
- Broca's [aphasia](aphasia.qmd)
- Discovered by French physician Paul Broca in the late 19th century, this small region in the left [frontal lobe](frontal lobe.qmd) has been linked to speech production.
